ComicInfo.Summary:
When a small town in Wyoming has their regular programming interrupted by a strange video, things begin to go from weird to horrific. Is it a hacker having fun, a government conspiracy, or something entirely more sinister behind this transmission?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Eric J & Sean Ellery | 1 | B | Cover B | Igor Vitorino & Ivan Nunes | 2 | C | Cover C | Alfredo Reyes & Ylenia Di Napoli | 3 | D | Thanksgiving Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Sabine Rich | Missing |
